hadiths.text: A’ishah(may Allaah be pleased with her) said “One of the wives of the Apostle of Allaah(ﷺ) observed I’tikaf along with him (in the mosque). She would see yellowness and redness. Sometimes we would place a washbasin while she prayed.”

chapter.eng-name: The Woman Suffering From Istihadah Observing I'tikaf
